00029 #ifndef ABSTRACTCHASTEREGION_HPP_
00030 #define ABSTRACTCHASTEREGION_HPP_

00032 #include <cassert>
00033 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00034 #include "ClassIsAbstract.hpp"
00035 #include "ChasteSerializationVersion.hpp"
00036 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00037 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00038 
00039 #include "ChastePoint.hpp"
00040 
00045 template <unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00046 class AbstractChasteRegion
00047 {
00049     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00056     template<class Archive>
00057     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00058     {
00059         // No member variables, but this is here so boost is happy serializing these classes.
00060     }
00061 public:
00062 
00066     AbstractChasteRegion()
00067     {}
00068 
00073     virtual void Destroy()
00074     {
00075     }
00076 
00080     virtual ~AbstractChasteRegion()
00081     {
00082     }
00083 
00091     virtual bool DoesContain(const ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rPointToCheck) const = 0;
00092 
00093 };
00094 
00095 TEMPLATED_CLASS_IS_ABSTRACT_1_UNSIGNED(AbstractChasteRegion)
00096

00109     CHASTE_VERSION_CONTENT(1);
00110 };
00111 } // namespace serialization
